name: docker-delta
description: Generate binary filesystem diffs between docker images to speed up distribution

scripts.prettify: balena-lint -t tsconfig.dev.json --fix -e js -e ts lib/ test/
scripts.lint: balena-lint -t tsconfig.dev.json -e js -e ts lib/ test/
scripts.prepare: node -e "try { require('husky').install() } catch (e) {if (e.code !== 'MODULE_NOT_FOUND') throw e}" && npx tsc

author: Balena Ltd.
